import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import classNames from "classnames"; import "./style.css" import ButtonCart from "../../../../components/ButtonCart"; const ServiceView = ( props ) =>{ const { cartList } = props const { product_name } = cartList console.log("cartList",cartList) const [checked,setChecked] = useState(false) function onClickHandle(e){ setChecked(!checked) } return (
{cartList.goods_name} { product_name.length > 0 ? product_name.map((el,index)=> {el} ) :'' }
售价：{cartList.price} 元
) } export default ServiceView
